topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b5ae686368720ee99d0500#post_54b5ae686368720ee99d0500
He realized that buying a japanese copy of mohu4 was insanely dumb and he sold it to Liam 

But now he's having mohu withdrawl. 
Like, serious withdrawl. He had a nightmare where he was in a wrestling  match with Rick flair over a copy of monster hunter. 
So to deal with this he played hearthstone. 
He claims to not have spent any money on it but I don't think it'll last. He says he's fighting impulses to go buy the expansion as they record the podcast.
